channel.title: CVE Feed for Omron -- CX-Position
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Omron -- CX-Position

item.title: CVE-2022-25959|2024-09-16T16:39:07.829Z -- omron -- cx-position
item.description: Omron CX-Position (versions 2.5.3 and prior) is vulnerable to memory corruption while processing a specific project file, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-26419|2024-09-16T18:08:28.165Z -- omron -- cx-position
item.description: Omron CX-Position (versions 2.5.3 and prior) is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflow conditions while parsing a specific project file, which may allow an attacker to locally execute arbitrary code.
